data.expected_result: The "Reply" message is written in your client's language
data.short_description: [6.7.4+; Samsung Galaxy and Android 7.0 (not exactly sure about Android and Samsung Galaxy) Specific] "Reply" in the typing section of the Reply Inline is written within Client's instead of System's Language.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a push notification that you can reply to - Reply, however, do not send it yet. - Observe the reply section
